3.sl_source: Zbežal je skupaj, s tistim dekletom.

4.en_source: I don't get what you say.

6.sl_source: Misliš, da sem jaz ugrabil Anja?
6.en_source: You think I took boss Anjo?
6.sl_trans: Misliš, da sem vzel šefa Anjo?

7.sl_source: Vem, da si še vedno jezen name in da širiš neresnice, o meni.
7.en_source: I know you're pissed off and you've been going around bad-mouthing me.
7.sl_trans: Vem, da si jezen in da si naokoli govoril o meni.

8.sl_source: Kdo za vraga, pa si ti?

9.sl_source: Za Kakiharinim hrbtom si preprodajal porno filme.
9.en_source: You say you didn't dub adult videos behind Mr Kakihara's back?
9.sl_trans: Pravite, da niste za hrbtom gospoda Kakihare sinhronizirali videoposnetkov za odrasle?

10.sl_source: To dokazuje, da nisi vreden zaupanja.
10.en_source: That proves you can't be trusted.
10.sl_trans: To dokazuje, da vam ni mogoče zaupati.

11.en_source: OK, it's true about the videos.
11.sl_trans: V redu, glede videoposnetkov je res.

12.sl_source: Toda ničesar ne vem, o tvojem šefu.
12.en_source: But I know nothing about your boss.
12.sl_trans: Toda o vašem šefu ne vem ničesar.

13.en_source: You have to believe me, please.

18.sl_source: Kako je Jijiiju uspelo, postaviti kamero in mikrofon?

18.sl_trans: Zanima me, kako je Jijiju uspelo vanj spraviti kamero in mikrofon?

22.en_source: It was before I was kicked out of the Anjo gang.
22.sl_trans: To je bilo, preden so me vrgli iz tolpe Anjo.

23.sl_source: Potem sta bila, s Kakiharo, prijatelja?
23.en_source: So you were buddies with Kakihara?

27.sl_source: Zakaj si izbral, prav ta obraz?
27.en_source: Why did you choose this face?

29.en_source: Right, I have to make a call.

30.en_source: You about ready to come clean?

31.en_source: I'm going to kill all of you.

37.sl_source: Mogoče bo pa tvoj penis, spregovoril.
37.en_source: If you won't talk, maybe your little one will.
37.sl_trans: Če ne boste govorili vi, bo morda govoril vaš malček.

39.en_source: Give me a break, damn it!

40.en_source: I'll do anything you want if you just stop.
40.sl_trans: Naredil bom vse, kar boš želel, če boš le prenehal.

44.en_source: What the fuck do you think you are doing?
44.sl_trans: Kaj za vraga misliš, da počneš?

46.sl_source: In kaj naj bi Suzuki naredil?

50.sl_source: Povejte nam, kaj počnete tukaj, gospod Funaki.
50.en_source: You tell us first what you are doing here, Mr Funaki.
50.sl_trans: Najprej nam povejte, kaj počnete tukaj, gospod Funaki.

51.sl_source: Nekdo je poklical in sporočil, da je Suzuki, v težavah.
51.en_source: Someone called to say Suzuki was in big trouble with your gang.
51.sl_trans: Nekdo je poklical, da je Suzuki v velikih težavah z vašo tolpo.

53.sl_source: Suzuki ne bi nikoli naredil tega.
53.en_source: Suzuki would never do such a stupid thing.
53.sl_trans: Suzuki ne bi nikoli storil takšne neumnosti.

56.sl_source: Namignili so nam, da je Suzuki ugrabil šefa.
56.en_source: We were tipped off that Suzuki had taken the boss.
56.sl_trans: Suzuki nam je sporočil, da je prevzel šefa.

61.sl_source: Verjetno ste edini, ki uživa v družbi ženske, prekrite z modricami.
61.en_source: You are the only one who enjoys seeing a girl's body all black-and-blue.
61.sl_trans: Ti si edini, ki uživa ob pogledu na črno-modro dekliško telo.

62.sl_source: Povej mi, kako so te pretepli.
62.en_source: Tell me about the beating you got yesterday?

65.en_source: I thought I was going to die.

66.sl_source: Želim si, da bi bil mrtev.

67.en_source: Shall I kill him for you?

71.en_source: That seems like a fair sum.

73.sl_source: Potem nam pa prepusti porno industrijo.
73.en_source: So hand the video business over to us and that'll settle the matter.
73.sl_trans: Zato nam predajte video posel in zadeva bo rešena.

74.sl_source: Ves naš denar je izginil, skupaj s šefom.
74.en_source: All of our money disappeared with the boss.
74.sl_trans: Ves naš denar je izginil s šefom.

75.sl_source: Če vam prepustimo še porno industrijo, ne bomo imeli ničesar.
75.en_source: Take our video business too and we'll have to fold.
75.sl_trans: Vzemite tudi naš video posel in morali bomo prenehati z delom.

76.sl_source: Ne boš se tako poceni izvlekel.
76.en_source: You think I'd let you off that easily?
76.sl_trans: Misliš, da te bom tako zlahka izpustil?

77.sl_source: Predlagam, da ga izločimo iz organizacije.
77.en_source: Throw this guy out of the syndicate.

80.sl_source: Mislim, da dva prsta ne bosta dovolj.
80.en_source: This is not a matter of cutting one or two fingers.
80.sl_trans: Ne gre za rezanje enega ali dveh prstov.

81.en_source: I have a taste for sweet things.

83.sl_source: V opravičilo si bom odrezal izvor užitka.
83.en_source: To apologise, I'll cut my source of pleasure.
83.sl_trans: Da bi se opravičil, bom prekinil svoj vir užitka.

85.en_source: All right, I'm on my way.

86.en_source: I'm going to look for the boss.

87.sl_source: Ustaviti sem se moral v bolnišnici.
87.en_source: I had to stop at the hospital.
87.sl_trans: Moral sem se ustaviti v bolnišnici.

93.sl_source: Več bom govoril, hitreje se bo obnovilo.
93.en_source: If I keep talking it'll get better.
93.sl_trans: Če bom še naprej govoril, bo bolje.

95.en_source: It's Karen, from the Hirando club.
95.sl_trans: To je Karen iz kluba Hirando.

98.sl_source: Ničesar ti ne dolgujem, zakaj bi ti torej povedala?
98.en_source: I don't owe you a thing so why should I tell you anything?
98.sl_trans: Ničesar ti ne dolgujem, zakaj bi ti torej moral karkoli povedati?

99.sl_source: Če ne misliš ničesar kupiti, se poberi.
99.en_source: If you're not here to score, just fuck off.
99.sl_trans: Če niste prišli, da bi dosegli zadetek, se umaknite.

100.sl_source: Kako si drzneš priti praznih rok in me prositi za uslugo?
100.en_source: How dare you come here empty-handed and ask me for a favour.
100.sl_trans: Kako si drzneš priti sem s praznimi rokami in me prositi za uslugo?

101.en_source: Who the hell do you think you are?
101.sl_trans: Kdo za vraga misliš, da si?

103.en_source: The guy with the body piercings from the Anjo gang.
103.sl_trans: Fant s piercingi na telesu iz tolpe Anjo.

104.en_source: Hey, who said you could come in?
104.sl_trans: Kdo je rekel, da lahko vstopite?

105.en_source: I don't care who he is.

106.sl_source: Ne družim se s takšnimi, kot si ti.
106.en_source: I don't associate with the likes of you.
106.sl_trans: Ne družim se s takimi, kot ste vi.

107.en_source: The boss is going to die.

109.sl_source: Nimamo veliko časa, preden ubijejo šefa.
109.en_source: If I don't hurry, the boss will die.
109.sl_trans: Če ne pohitim, bo šef umrl.

110.sl_source: Kot sem že rekla, če ne misliš ničesar kupiti, se poberi.
110.en_source: Like I said, if you're not here to score you're in the way.
110.sl_trans: Kot sem rekel, če niste tukaj, da bi dosegli zadetek, ste na poti.

112.sl_source: Veš kaj se bo zgodilo, če umre?
112.en_source: Do you know what'll happen if he dies?
112.sl_trans: Ali veste, kaj se bo zgodilo, če umre?

113.sl_source: Bil je že notri, ko smo prispeli.
113.en_source: He was already in there when we arrived.
113.sl_trans: Ko sva prišla, je bil že tam.

114.sl_source: Ovil sem ga z lepilnim trakom, da ne pobegne.
114.en_source: I taped it up in case he tries to escape.
114.sl_trans: Oblepil sem ga z lepilno folijo, če bi skušal pobegniti.

119.sl_source: Povedal ti bom, če mi daš fiks.
119.en_source: I'll tell you if you shoot me up first.
119.sl_trans: Povedal ti bom, če me boš najprej ustrelil.

122.sl_trans: Že dolgo je mrtev in pokopan.

123.sl_source: Če ne dobim fiksa me lahko, kar ubiješ, brat Kakihara.
123.en_source: If I'm not getting a shot then hurry up and kill me, brother Kakihara.
123.sl_trans: Če ne bom dobil strela, potem pohiti in me ubij, brat Kakihara.

125.sl_trans: Če me boš vseeno ubil, naj bo že konec, brat Kakihara.

132.en_source: It was Ichi who did it.

134.sl_source: Mi smo samo počistili, za njim.
134.en_source: I only cleaned up after him.

135.sl_source: Mislim, da boš ti naslednja Ichijeva žrtev.
135.en_source: It seems that Ichi's next target is you, brother Kakihara.

136.sl_source: Zaljubljen si bil v Anja, kajne?
136.en_source: You had the hots for Anjo, didn't you?
136.sl_trans: Bila si zaljubljena v Anjo, kajne?

137.sl_source: Pa ne zato, ker bi bil gej in so ti všeč njegova jajca.
137.en_source: Not because you're queer or because you admired his balls.
137.sl_trans: Ne zato, ker ste pedri ali ker ste občudovali njegova jajca.

138.sl_trans: Zato, ker ste uživali v bolečini, ki jo je povzročal, ko vas je pretepal.

139.sl_source: Zato se tako trudiš, da bi ga našel.
139.en_source: That's why you want to find him so badly.
139.sl_trans: Zato si ga tako močno želite najti.

141.en_source: Kakihara, I'm going to get you for this.
141.sl_trans: Kakihara, za to te bom dobil.

142.sl_source: Ne bom pozabil, kaj si naredil.
142.en_source: I'll never forget what you did.
142.sl_trans: Nikoli ne bom pozabil, kaj ste storili.

143.en_source: I'm going to kill you, you bastard.

145.sl_trans: Vprašal je, kje je Anjevo dekle.

147.sl_trans: Želimo dekle, ki ste ga odpeljali skupaj z Anjo.

148.sl_source: Takoj nama povej, kam ste jo odpeljali.

152.sl_source: Če ne boš spregovoril, vas bomo vse pobili.
152.en_source: If you don't say something, we'll kill the whole gang.
152.sl_trans: Če ne boste ničesar rekli, bomo ubili celotno tolpo.

155.en_source: I've got nothing to do with it.

164.sl_source: Sporočili so nam, da je nekdo, z razrezanimi usti, napadel Anjevo pisarno.

164.sl_trans: Nekdo pravi, da je videl moškega z raztrganimi usti, ki je napadel Anjevo pisarno.

167.sl_source: V tej maski, ne morem dihati.

168.sl_source: Oči bi moral izrezati, nekoliko višje.

168.sl_trans: Oči bi moral izrezati nekoliko višje.

169.en_source: It fogs up when I breathe.

176.sl_source: Tiče lahko sesaš, muco imaš tudi in to je vse, kar si zaslužila?
176.en_source: You can suck dicks, you have a cunt and this is all you earn?
176.sl_trans: Lahko sesate kurce, imate pizdo in to je vse, kar zaslužite?

180.sl_source: Kdo za vraga, si pa ti?

181.en_source: Come in here, you little shit.

182.en_source: What the fuck are you doing?

183.en_source: Are you some kind of pervert?

200.sl_source: Obljubil sem ti, da ga bom ubil.
200.en_source: I promised I'd kill him for you.
200.sl_trans: Obljubil sem, da ga bom ubil zate.

202.sl_source: Od sedaj naprej, te bom jaz pretepal.
202.en_source: From now on I'll beat you up.

205.en_source: Kakihara, you are expelled from the Syndicate.

211.en_source: Is that all you wanted to say?

213.sl_source: Potem se vam pa zahvaljujem za vse.
213.en_source: Then I thank you for everything.
213.sl_trans: Potem se vam zahvaljujem za vse.

214.en_source: That was a piece of cake.

216.en_source: Are you sure we're doing the right thing?

217.en_source: You think he's bent on revenge?

218.en_source: I forgot to mention one thing.

220.en_source: I'm taking over the Anjo gang.

223.sl_trans: Vsi jakuzi v Shinjukuju nas preganjajo.

248.sl_trans: Ko so jo posilili, je kričala, naj ji pomagam.

249.en_source: But my legs were shaking so violently that I couldn't move.

250.sl_source: Gospodični Tachibana, si želel samo pomagati?
250.en_source: I still dream about how she cried out.
250.sl_trans: Še vedno sanjam o tem, kako je jokala.

251.sl_source: Počutim se, kot da bi jo jaz posilil.
251.en_source: You wanted to save Ms Tachibana so badly?
251.sl_trans: Tako zelo ste želeli rešiti gospo Tačibano?

253.sl_source: Kot da bi želela, naj jo posilim.
253.en_source: Surely you wanted to save her?

254.en_source: She wanted me to rape her.

256.sl_source: Zakaj bi mi Sailor, storila to?

257.sl_trans: Zakaj bi mi Sailor storil kaj takega?

259.sl_trans: Zakaj bi mi Sailor storil kaj takega?

260.en_source: Get a grip on yourself, Ichi.

264.sl_source: S kom pa misliš, da se pogovarjaš?
264.en_source: Who do you think you're talking to?
264.sl_trans: S kom mislite, da se pogovarjate?

276.en_source: What the hell are you doing, Karen?

284.en_source: Hey, give it back to me.

286.sl_source: Tvojega očeta so odpustili iz policije, ker je izgubil svojo pištolo.
286.en_source: Your father got fired from the police because he lost his gun.
286.sl_trans: Tvojega očeta so odpustili od policije, ker je izgubil pištolo.

288.sl_source: Ti si pa še večji idiot.

288.sl_trans: Je enako velik idiot kot njegov oče.

289.en_source: Those guns are paid for with tax money.
289.sl_trans: To orožje je plačano z davki.

290.sl_source: Zato nam vrni naš denar, usrane.
290.en_source: Give us our money back, asshole.

291.en_source: Hurry up and bring it back.

292.en_source: Can't you hear what I'm saying?

297.sl_source: Saj želiš biti moja punca, kajne?
297.en_source: You want to be my woman, don't you?

298.en_source: Then give it to me like you did before.
298.sl_trans: Potem mi ga daj, kot si ga dal prej.

300.sl_source: Poslušaj, ko želiš nekoga poškodovati, ne smeš razmišljati o bolečini, ki jo čuti.
300.en_source: Listen, when you're hurting someone don't think of the pain that he feels.

301.sl_trans: Osredotočite se le na užitek, da mu povzročite bolečino.

302.en_source: That's the only way to show true compassion for your partner.
302.sl_trans: Le tako lahko pokažete resnično sočutje do partnerja.

304.sl_source: Udari me, kot da me želiš ubiti.

305.en_source: The boss was a lot better at this.
305.sl_trans: Šef je bil pri tem veliko boljši.

309.en_source: These guys need to be killed.

310.en_source: Go in fast, and finish them off.

314.sl_source: Delajo za tipa, ki si ga ubil.
314.en_source: They work for the guy you killed before.
314.sl_trans: Delajo za človeka, ki si ga prej ubil.

316.en_source: Just go in and do your thing.
316.sl_trans: Preprosto vstopite in delajte po svoje.

321.sl_source: Saj si rekel, da se želiš znebiti vseh nasilnežev.

321.sl_trans: Ali se niste nameravali znebiti vseh nasilnežev na svetu?

322.sl_trans: Ti ljudje od revnih izsiljujejo denar.

326.sl_trans: Ali ni podoben tistemu fantu Imamuri, ki te je ustrahoval v srednji šoli?

327.en_source: And isn't the guy next to him the spitting image of that kid Tokito who scribbled all over your textbooks?
327.sl_trans: In ali ni fant poleg njega podoba tistega fanta Tokita, ki je popisal vse vaše učbenike?

332.en_source: I told you not to worry.
332.sl_trans: Rekel sem ti, naj te ne skrbi.

333.en_source: They're just a big bunch of bullies.

334.sl_source: Ljudje, ki sem jih pravkar ubil, niso tisti, ki so me nadlegovali.
334.en_source: The people I just killed were not the ones who used to bully me.
334.sl_trans: Ljudje, ki sem jih pravkar ubil, niso bili tisti, ki so me ustrahovali.

336.en_source: Of course they had to die.

339.sl_source: Kdo pa bo pobijal zlobneže, če jih ne boš ti?
339.en_source: If you don't kill the bad guys, who will?
339.sl_trans: Če ne boste ubili slabih, kdo jih bo?

341.en_source: You'll go on killing, won't you?

342.en_source: I don't want to any more.

345.sl_source: Hvala, ker ste mi prejle pomagali.
345.en_source: Thank you for protecting me back there.
345.sl_trans: Hvala, ker ste me tam zaščitili.

347.sl_trans: Je z vami vse v redu?

352.sl_source: Kaj za vraga se je zgodilo tu?
352.sl_trans: Kaj za vraga se je zgodilo?

365.sl_source: Poglej, iz česa je sestavljeno človeško telo.
365.en_source: The human body is made out of a single tube like this.
365.sl_trans: Človeško telo je sestavljeno iz ene same cevi, kot je ta.

369.en_source: Takayama, call the East Shinjuku police station.
369.sl_trans: Takayama, pokličite policijsko postajo East Shinjuku.

371.sl_source: Ne, poskrbel bom, da nam bodo pomagali.
371.en_source: No, I'll get them to help us.
371.sl_trans: Ne, prepričal jih bom, da nam pomagajo.

372.sl_source: Včeraj mi je nek moški pomagal, ko so me fantje nadlegovali.
372.en_source: I was being bullied when this strong guy turned up and kicked their asses.
372.sl_trans: Nadlegovali so me, ko se je pojavil ta močan fant in jim nakopal rit.

373.en_source: You do karate and all that stuff, don't you?
373.sl_trans: Ukvarjaš se s karatejem in vsemi temi stvarmi, kajne?

379.en_source: I'm on a very important job now.

380.sl_source: Lahko se zgodi, da nekega dne ne bom prišel domov.
380.en_source: It may be that one day I won't be able to come home.
380.sl_trans: Lahko se zgodi, da nekega dne ne bom mogel priti domov.

381.sl_source: Če se mi kaj zgodi, mi obljubi, da boš odšel živeti, k mami.
381.en_source: If something should happen to me, promise me you'll go and live with your mum.
381.sl_trans: Če se mi kaj zgodi, mi obljubi, da boš šel živet k mami.

384.en_source: I can take care of myself.

388.en_source: I don't know what he looks like.

389.sl_source: Preveri vsakogar, ki zaudarja po krvi.
389.en_source: Find anyone who smells of blood.
389.sl_trans: Poiščite vse, ki dišijo po krvi.

390.sl_source: Sedaj pa pojdi in ga poišči.

391.en_source: What the fuck do you think you're doing?
391.sl_trans: Kaj za vraga misliš, da počneš?

392.sl_source: Najprej pobruhaš eno izmed deklet, potem pa ugotovimo, da tudi plačati ne moreš.
392.en_source: First you puke all over one of our girls and then you say you've no money?
392.sl_trans: Najprej se izbljuvaš na eno od naših deklet, potem pa rečeš, da nimaš denarja?

393.en_source: Who the fuck do you think you are?

396.en_source: Give us our money back right now.

397.sl_source: Lahko prodaš tudi ledvico, samo da dobimo denar nazaj, pizdun!

398.sl_source: Samo da dobimo denar nazaj, pizdun!
398.en_source: As long as we get our money, asshole.

400.en_source: Who the hell are you, anyway?

407.sl_source: Kaj ni bil že dovolj tepen?

408.en_source: In that case, why don't you pay off his debts?
408.sl_trans: Zakaj v tem primeru ne bi plačali njegovih dolgov?

409.sl_source: Če ne boš pazil, boš tudi ti tepen.
409.en_source: Watch out, or you'll get hurt.

412.sl_source: Ne vem, iz katerih rovt prihajaš, toda na čelu ti piše, da si izgubljen.
412.en_source: I don't know what backwater you're from, but you have sitting duck written all over your forehead.
412.sl_trans: Ne vem, iz kakšnega zakotnega kraja prihajaš, ampak na čelu imaš napisano, da si sedeča raca.

414.en_source: Don't you understand what I am saying?

416.en_source: Get a move on, I said.

419.sl_source: Anjo, to je tisti policaj, ki je izgubil pištolo.
419.en_source: Boss Anjo, he's the cop who lost his gun.
419.sl_trans: Šef Anjo je policist, ki je izgubil pištolo.

420.sl_source: Nastopil je tudi, na olimpijskih igrah, v streljanju.
420.en_source: He became known as an Olympic marksman.
420.sl_trans: Postal je znan kot olimpijski strelec.

425.sl_source: Jaz te ne bom nikoli zapustil.
425.en_source: But I'll always stay with you.
425.sl_trans: Vendar bom vedno ostala s teboj.

429.en_source: This is no place for you.

433.sl_source: Spominjaš me name, ko sem bil mlajši.
433.en_source: You remind me of myself a long time ago.
433.sl_trans: Spominjaš me nase pred davnimi časi.

434.sl_source: Moškega, ki mi je pomagal, ko nisem imel ničesar, so ubili.
434.en_source: The guy who picked me up when I was down has been murdered.
434.sl_trans: Človek, ki me je dvignil, ko sem bil na dnu, je bil umorjen.

435.sl_source: Ko sem brezupno taval, me je vzel pod svoje okrilje.
435.en_source: He took me in when I drifted with nowhere to go.
435.sl_trans: Sprejel me je, ko sem se izgubil in nisem imel kam iti.

436.sl_source: Najti moram njegove morilce in ga maščevati.
436.en_source: I must find his killers and avenge him.
436.sl_trans: Poiskati moram njegove morilce in ga maščevati.

437.sl_source: Pojej, ker se ti bo shladilo.
437.en_source: Eat up, or the noodles will go soft.
437.sl_trans: Pojejte, sicer se bodo rezanci zmehčali.

440.sl_trans: Zdi se, da ste imeli slabe sanje.

441.sl_source: Notri boš našel fotografije največjih zlobnežev.
441.en_source: Inside, you'll find photos of the biggest bullies.
441.sl_trans: V notranjosti boste našli fotografije največjih nasilnežev.

444.sl_source: Obstajajo še hujši, kot tisti, ki so te nadlegovali.
444.en_source: They are even worse than the boys who bullied you.
444.sl_trans: So še hujši od fantov, ki so te ustrahovali.

445.sl_source: Kaj pa tisti, ki so samo stali in opazovali?
445.en_source: Those were not the only bad people around.
445.sl_trans: To niso bili edini slabi ljudje v okolici.

446.sl_source: Tisti, ki so bili tam, pa niso naredili ničesar.
446.en_source: The ones that stood by and did nothing are even worse.
446.sl_trans: Tisti, ki so stali ob strani in niso storili ničesar, so še hujši.

447.en_source: You must go after all of them.

448.en_source: That's why you grew strong, isn't it?

449.sl_source: Toda, gospodični Tachibana sem skušal pomagati.
449.en_source: But Ms Tachibana tried to help me.
449.sl_trans: Toda gospa Tačibana mi je poskušala pomagati.

450.sl_source: Takrat si bil prešibek, da bi ji pomagal.
450.en_source: Back then you were too weak to help her.
450.sl_trans: Takrat ste bili prešibki, da bi ji pomagali.

451.sl_source: Toda sedaj si dovolj močan, da premagaš vse.
451.en_source: But now you are strong enough to defeat all of them.
451.sl_trans: Toda zdaj ste dovolj močni, da jih lahko vse premagate.

460.sl_source: Če se ne boš soočil s stvarmi, ne boš nikoli postal pravi moški!
460.en_source: Running away from things will never make you a man!
460.sl_trans: S pobegom pred stvarmi nikoli ne boš postal moški!

466.sl_source: Si videl, kaj se zgodi, ko me ne poslušaš?
466.en_source: That's what you get for not doing what I tell you.
466.sl_trans: To dobiš, ker ne delaš, kar ti rečem.

468.en_source: They'll calm you down for a while.
468.sl_trans: Za nekaj časa vas bodo pomirili.

471.en_source: I don't want to kill any more people.

476.sl_source: Že celo večnost sem detektiv, a česa takega, še nisem videl.
476.en_source: I've been a detective forever but I've never seen anything like this.
476.sl_trans: Že od nekdaj sem detektiv, a česa takega še nisem videl.

477.sl_source: Celo ti, nisi sposoben narediti tega.
477.en_source: Even you can't do that, brother.
477.sl_trans: Tega ne moreš storiti niti ti, brat.

478.sl_source: Lahko bi naredil, če bi hotel.
478.en_source: I could, if I wanted to.

479.sl_source: Za tem masakrom, se skriva nekaj nečloveškega.
479.en_source: There's something inhuman to this carnage.
479.sl_trans: V tem pokolu je nekaj nečloveškega.

480.sl_source: Večina ljudi, v sebi skriva, trohico sadizma, toda ta, Ichi, je čisti sadist.
480.en_source: Most people have a touch of both sadism and masochism inside them I can't wait to meet him.
480.sl_trans: Večina ljudi ima v sebi kanček sadizma in mazohizma Komaj čakam, da ga spoznam.

481.en_source: But he'll come here anyway, won't he?
481.sl_trans: Toda vseeno bo prišel sem, kajne?

482.sl_source: Slej ko prej, se bo prikazal.

483.sl_source: Nobenega vzorca ni, vse je samo igra.

484.sl_source: Toda ko se prikaže, moram biti pripravljen.
484.en_source: If I'm not ready to die when he comes, I'll become increasingly desperate.
484.sl_trans: Če ne bom pripravljen umreti, ko bo prišel, bom vedno bolj obupan.

485.sl_source: Če bom vedel, da prihaja, bom v prednosti.
485.en_source: But if I know he's coming, I'll do all I can to stop him from killing me.
485.sl_trans: Toda če bom vedel, da prihaja, bom storil vse, kar je v moji moči, da me ne ubije.

486.sl_source: Zato mi boste, ko izveste, povedali, kje se skriva.
486.en_source: So you will tell me where this Ichi is even if you don't want to.
486.sl_trans: Torej mi boš povedal, kje je ta Iči, tudi če tega ne želiš.

487.sl_source: Se vam kaj svita, kje bi lahko bil?

488.sl_source: Nekdo, ki ga poznam je izvedel, za Ichijevega kitajskega prijatelja, ki se ukvarja, z zvodništvom.
488.en_source: Somebody I know stumbled upon this Chinese pal of Ichi who goes around pimping.
488.sl_trans: Nekdo, ki ga poznam, je naletel na Ičijevega kitajskega prijatelja, ki se ukvarja s suženjstvom.

489.sl_source: Najdite ga, pa boste izvedeli, kaj več.
489.en_source: Find him and you'll discover much more.
489.sl_trans: Poiščite ga in odkrili boste veliko več.

491.sl_source: To sem izvedel, od dekleta, ki dela v njegovem klubu.
491.en_source: I picked it up from a girl in this club.
491.sl_trans: Izbrala sem ga od dekleta v tem klubu.

493.en_source: We can't turn down a request from Kakihara, can we?
493.sl_trans: Ne moremo zavrniti prošnje Kakihare, kajne?

494.sl_source: Če ne bi bilo njega, tudi detektiva, ne bi bila.
494.en_source: Without him we wouldn't even be detectives.
494.sl_trans: Brez njega ne bi bili niti detektivi.

496.en_source: We'll find that dickhead soon enough.

497.en_source: There aren't so many Chinese pimps around.

499.sl_source: Če ni to policaj, ki so mu ukradli pištolo.
499.en_source: The cop who got fired for losing his gun.
499.sl_trans: Policist, ki so ga odpustili, ker je izgubil pištolo.

503.sl_source: Tipu ukradejo pištolo in vseeno postane poklicni morilec.
503.en_source: A guy loses his gun and next thing you know, he becomes a gunman.
503.sl_trans: Nekdo izgubi pištolo in potem postane strelec.

506.sl_source: Potreben sem, potreben sem, potreben sem .
506.en_source: I want to fuck, fuck, fuck.

510.en_source: Can I come over right now?

511.sl_source: Si razširila govorice o tisti punci?
511.en_source: Did you plant the information about that girl?
511.sl_trans: Ste informacije o tem dekletu podtaknili vi?

513.sl_source: Potem je samo še vprašanje časa, kdaj bodo Ryuja ujeli.
513.en_source: Then it's only a matter of time before Long gets caught.
513.sl_trans: Potem je le še vprašanje časa, kdaj bodo Dolgega ujeli.

515.en_source: Ichi is going through a bad patch.

517.sl_source: Sicer se mu dvigne, vendar mu pride samo, če je priča nasilju.
517.en_source: He gets hard, but he cannot ejaculate.
517.sl_trans: Postavi se mu, vendar ne more ejakulirati.

520.en_source: Tell me, what is this Ichi like?
520.sl_trans: Povej mi, kakšen je ta Ichi?

522.en_source: Come on, tell me about him.

529.sl_source: Ko je bil majhen, so ga nadlegovali.
529.en_source: He was bullied when he was a kid.

530.sl_source: Celo sedaj, začne jokati, ko se razjezi.
530.en_source: Even now, when he gets mad he starts to cry.
530.sl_trans: Še zdaj, ko se razjezi, začne jokati.

531.sl_source: Sprva se lahko kontrolira, potem pa nenadoma izbruhne.
531.en_source: At first he keeps it under control, then suddenly he lashes out to kill.
531.sl_trans: Sprva ga obvladuje, nato pa se nenadoma zateče k ubijanju.

533.sl_source: Večino časa, je prijazen mlad fant.
533.en_source: Most of the time, he's quite a nice young man.
533.sl_trans: Večino časa je zelo prijeten mladenič.

534.sl_source: Ko pa znori, se spremeni v morilca.
534.en_source: But when he loses it, he turns into a killer.
534.sl_trans: Ko ga izgubi, se spremeni v morilca.

536.sl_source: Toda v resnici ga niso nikoli nadlegovali.
536.en_source: But he was never really bullied, you see.
536.sl_trans: Toda nikoli ga niso zares ustrahovali.

537.sl_source: Potem, ko so mu ubili starša, sem se poigral, z njegovim spominom.
537.en_source: After he killed his parents, I messed around with his memory.
537.sl_trans: Ko je ubil svoje starše, sem se poigral z njegovim spominom.

538.sl_source: Prisilil sem ga, da verjame, da so ga nadlegovali.
538.en_source: I made him believe that he used to be bullied.
538.sl_trans: Prepričal sem ga, da so ga nekoč ustrahovali.

539.sl_source: Sedaj mu vsakič, ko ga potrebujem, natvezim kakšno zgodbo.
539.en_source: So now every time I need him for a job, I feed him more stories.
539.sl_trans: Tako ga zdaj vsakič, ko ga potrebujem za delo, nahranim z več zgodbami.

540.en_source: And he believes all of that?
540.sl_trans: In on verjame v vse to?

541.sl_source: Torej sugestije, pod hipnozo, resnično delujejo?
541.en_source: Does that post-hypnosis stuff really work?

542.sl_source: Da, toda mislim, da sem pretivaral pri tisti zgodbi o posilstvu.
542.en_source: Yes, but I think I overdid it on that rape story.
542.sl_trans: Ja, ampak mislim, da sem pretiraval z zgodbo o posilstvu.

543.sl_source: Povedal sem mu, da so ga nadlegovali, v srednji šoli in da so posilili punco, ki je stala poleg njega.
543.en_source: I told him he was bullied in high school and that the girl who stood by him ended up getting raped.
543.sl_trans: Povedal sem mu, da so ga v srednji šoli ustrahovali in da je bilo dekle, ki mu je stalo ob strani, na koncu posiljeno.

546.sl_source: Zgodba o punci, ki so jo posilili.
546.en_source: A story about a girl who was raped.
546.sl_trans: Zgodba o deklici, ki je bila posiljena.

549.sl_source: Si tudi meni vgradil kakšno sugestijo?
549.en_source: Did you also put me under some kind of hypnosis?
549.sl_trans: Ali ste me tudi vi spravili v nekakšno hipnozo?

553.en_source: I feel sorry for you, Kaneko.

554.sl_source: Najprej izgubiš pištolo in te odpustijo iz policije.
554.en_source: First you lose your gun and get kicked of the force.
554.sl_trans: Najprej izgubite pištolo in vas izločijo iz enote.

555.en_source: Then you become a yakuza, which is OK.
555.sl_trans: Potem postaneš jakuza, kar je v redu.

556.sl_source: Sedaj pa imaš morilca za petami.
556.en_source: But now you have a killer on your heels.
556.sl_trans: Toda zdaj vam je za petami morilec.

560.sl_source: To delo opravljam samo zato, ker sem nasilnež.
560.en_source: The only reason I ended up in this business is because I was tough.
560.sl_trans: V tem poslu sem pristal le zato, ker sem bil trd.

561.sl_source: Včasih pogledam običajne ljudi, ki služijo denar, kot sužnji in pomislim, da bi bil lahko, eden izmed njih.
561.en_source: Sometimes I look at those salary slaves imagining I could have easily ended up that way, living such a life.
561.sl_trans: Včasih gledam te plačane sužnje in si predstavljam, da bi zlahka končal tako, živel takšno življenje.

562.sl_source: Kaj boš počel, ko bo vsega konec?
562.en_source: What will you do when all this is over?
562.sl_trans: Kaj boste počeli, ko bo vsega tega konec?

563.en_source: I only want revenge for boss Anjo.
563.sl_trans: Hočem se samo maščevati za šefa Anjo.

564.en_source: There will be no one left to taste our revenge.
564.sl_trans: Ne bo nikogar več, ki bi okusil naše maščevanje.

566.en_source: He'll have to manage on his own.

567.sl_source: Osredotočen sem samo, na eno stvar.
567.en_source: I have only one thing on my mind.
567.sl_trans: V mislih imam le eno stvar.

568.sl_source: Še nikoli nisem srečal tako trdožive prasice.
568.en_source: I've never seen such a tough bitch.
568.sl_trans: Še nikoli nisem videl tako hude mrhe.

571.sl_source: Sedaj ti bo Saburo pokazal, kako se stvari streže.
571.en_source: Time for sleuthhound Saburo to step into the ring.
571.sl_trans: Čas je, da v ring stopi lovec Saburo.

573.sl_source: Izvedel sem, kje se skriva Ryu.
573.en_source: OK, I know where to find Long.
573.sl_trans: V redu, vem, kje najti Long.

575.en_source: Takayama, keep an eye on the girl.

577.sl_source: Sem mogoče rekel, da greš lahko z nami?
577.en_source: Did I tell you to come?
577.sl_trans: Ali sem vam rekel, da pridete?

579.en_source: I didn't ask you to come, did I?
579.sl_trans: Nisem vas prosil, da pridete, kajne?

580.sl_source: Ne vidiš, da sem slabe volje?

583.sl_trans: Je z vami vse v redu?

586.sl_source: Vprašal sem, če boš kozarec vode?
586.en_source: I said, do you want some water?
586.sl_trans: Rekel sem, ali hočeš malo vode?

587.en_source: Do you want some or not?

592.sl_trans: Kako to, da Jijii ne odgovori?

597.en_source: Giving pain is a serious business.

598.en_source: There's no love in your punches.

609.sl_source: Če ti je bilo res žal, zakaj mi nisi pomagal?
609.en_source: Then why didn't you come to my rescue?
609.sl_trans: Zakaj mi potem niste priskočili na pomoč?

612.sl_source: Po tistem sem padla v popolni obup.

613.sl_source: Preko interneta sem spoznala moškega, ki je trdil, da je sadist.
613.en_source: I met someone through the Internet who said he was a sadist.
613.sl_trans: Prek interneta sem spoznala nekoga, ki je rekel, da je sadist.

617.sl_source: Verjetno je želel kaj izvedeti, od nje in se je preveč vživel.
617.en_source: I guess he wanted to get something from her but just went a little too far.
617.sl_trans: Mislim, da je želel od nje nekaj dobiti, a je šel malo predaleč.

619.sl_source: Ne vmešavaj se, kamor se ti ni treba.
619.en_source: Don't get in my way all the time.
619.sl_trans: Ne postavljajte se mi ves čas na pot.

620.sl_source: Sem ti rekel, da ne bo prijetno?
620.en_source: I told you it wouldn't be pretty.
620.sl_trans: Rekel sem vam, da ne bo lepo.

623.sl_source: Povedal sem ti že, da ne vem.
623.en_source: I told you, I don't know.
623.sl_trans: Rekel sem vam, da ne vem.

624.sl_source: Ichi je še bolj izprijen, kot sem si mislil.
624.en_source: Ichi is even more depraved than you could ever imagine.
624.sl_trans: Iči je še bolj pokvarjen, kot si lahko predstavljate.

625.sl_source: On je pošast, ki ubija brez obžalovanja.
625.en_source: He's a monster who kills without any feeling for his victims.
625.sl_trans: Je pošast, ki ubija brez kakršnegakoli občutka do svojih žrtev.

626.en_source: Is that so hard to understand?

628.sl_source: Misliš, da se boš s tem, kar počneš, izognil usodi?
628.en_source: Do you think that what you're doing will make everything inevitable?
628.sl_trans: Ali menite, da bo zaradi tega, kar počnete, vse postalo neizogibno?

629.sl_source: Ne glede na to, kako se trudiš, bo vse zaman, ti usrane.
629.en_source: No matter how hard you try, it'll all be in vain, you asshole.
629.sl_trans: Ne glede na to, kako zelo se trudiš, bo vse zaman, kreten.

630.sl_source: Ljudje, kot si ti, nimajo pojma in mi ne morejo nič.
630.en_source: People like you who can only watch know absolutely nothing.
630.sl_trans: Ljudje, kot ste vi, ki lahko samo gledajo, ne vedo popolnoma ničesar.

631.sl_source: Jaz držim v rokah vse niti.

634.sl_source: Se ti ne zdi, da se stvari odvijajo, kot po maslu?
634.en_source: Don't you feel it's all running a bit too smoothly, you creep?
634.sl_trans: Se vam ne zdi, da vse teče nekoliko preveč gladko?

635.en_source: Your fate is without a shred of meaning.

636.en_source: You'll be killed senselessly by Ichi.

637.sl_trans: Nič več in nič manj, kreteni.

638.sl_source: In tvoja kazen, ker ne poznaš Ichija .
638.en_source: Your penalty for not knowing Ichi.

640.en_source: This'll put an end to your pimping.

644.en_source: You feel up to it again?
644.sl_trans: Se spet počutiš pripravljenega za to?

645.en_source: OK, come to the yakuza apartment.
645.sl_trans: V redu, pridite v stanovanje jakuze.

646.en_source: There's lots of work to do.

650.sl_source: Ichi nima časa, da bi se ukvarjal, s takšnimi nepomembnimi izmečki, kot si ti.
650.en_source: Ichi has no time to be playing with a dumb gorilla like you.
650.sl_trans: Iči nima časa, da bi se igral z neumno gorilo, kot si ti.

652.sl_source: Če boš naredil to, bom umrl!
652.en_source: If you do that, I'll die.
652.sl_trans: Če boš to storil, bom umrl.

661.en_source: Even big brother Jiro couldn't do this.
661.sl_trans: Tega ni zmogel niti starejši brat Jiro.

663.sl_source: Sedaj me je pa res strah.

664.en_source: We'll go look for him, too.
664.sl_trans: Tudi mi ga bomo šli iskat.

666.en_source: It's you and me guarding the coop.
666.sl_trans: V kurniku varujeva ti in jaz.

667.sl_source: Misliš, da lahko z golimi rokami nekomu odtrgaš roko?
667.en_source: Do you think it's possible to yank someone's arm off with your bare hands?
667.sl_trans: Menite, da je mogoče nekomu z golimi rokami odtrgati roko?

668.sl_source: Vprašal sem, če lahko nekomu, z golimi rokami, odtrgaš roko?
668.en_source: I said, is it possible to yank an arm off with your bare hands?
668.sl_trans: Rekel sem, ali je mogoče z golimi rokami odtrgati roko?

674.sl_source: Čas je, da pokažem Saburu, česa sem zmožen.
674.en_source: I'll have little Saburo shaking in his boots.
674.sl_trans: Saburo se bo tresel v škornjih.

680.sl_source: Moški, s katerim si jedel v restavraciji, je tvoj dolgo izgubljeni brat.
680.en_source: That man who treated you to a bowl of noodles - he's your long, lost brother.
680.sl_trans: Človek, ki vas je pogostil s skledo rezancev, je vaš davno izgubljeni brat.

681.sl_source: Zato mu naslednjič, ko ga vidiš, izkaži spoštovanje.
681.en_source: So the next time you see him, make sure you pay him your respect.
681.sl_trans: Ko ga boste naslednjič videli, mu izkažite spoštovanje.

686.sl_source: Saburo, kakšen misliš, da je ta Ichi?
686.en_source: Saburo, what kind of guy is this Ichi?
686.sl_trans: Saburo, kakšen človek je ta Ichi?

687.en_source: He must be some kind of monster.

689.en_source: Even the infamous Kakihara is scared now?
689.sl_trans: Celo zloglasni Kakihara je zdaj prestrašen?

692.sl_source: Že dolgo nisem čutil, takšnega razburjenja.
692.en_source: It's been years since I felt such a mix of anxiety and anticipation.
692.sl_trans: Že več let nisem čutila takšne mešanice tesnobe in pričakovanja.

693.sl_source: In še takrat, ko sem čutil, sem bil na koncu razočaran.
693.en_source: The few times I've felt this, I was let down in the end.
693.sl_trans: Nekajkrat, ko sem se tako počutil, sem bil na koncu razočaran.

694.en_source: I really want to lose myself in desperation.
694.sl_trans: Resnično se želim izgubiti v obupu.

695.sl_source: Upam, da me Ichi, ne bo razočaral.
695.en_source: What if Ichi also lets me down?
695.sl_trans: Kaj pa, če me bo tudi Iči pustil na cedilu?

700.sl_source: Enak občutek imam, kot takrat, ko nama je umrl brat Ichiro.
700.en_source: It's exactly the same feeling as when our big brother Ichiro died.
700.sl_trans: To je popolnoma enak občutek, kot ko je umrl naš starejši brat Ičiro.

705.sl_source: Upal sem, da bom nekega dne, sam ubil Jira.

706.en_source: I was looking forward to killing Jiro myself one day.
706.sl_trans: Veselil sem se, da bom nekega dne tudi sam ubil Jira.

715.sl_source: To je tisti, ki mi je pomagal in ki obvlada karate.
715.en_source: He's the guy who used karate to help me.
715.sl_trans: On je tisti, ki mi je pomagal s karatejem.

717.sl_source: Ostani tu in se ne premikaj.
717.sl_trans: Ne premaknite se niti za centimeter.

719.sl_source: Sedaj me je pa res strah.

724.sl_source: Upam, da me ne boš razočaral!

725.en_source: Why are you doing this to me, brother?

735.sl_source: Ne moreva se pomeriti, če se boš tako obnašal.
735.en_source: How can we have our challenge match, if you act this way?
735.sl_trans: Kako lahko organiziramo tekmo izzivov, če se tako obnašaš?

739.sl_source: Nikogar ni, ki bi me ubil.
